duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for coordinating and supporting projects with various degrees of complexity and scope.
Assist experienced Project Managers in managing projects within authority level and delivery of services as a result of the scope of assigned projects.
Assists in the definition of project scope and objectives, performs business analysis, and helps create and maintain comprehensive project documentation.
Works in conjunction with project owners to ensure quality service delivery and fosters successful relationships with internal customers.
Assist with distribution of project tasks and responsibilities to appropriate areas and coordinate project resources appropriately.
Ensures that the project team responds to and addresses inquiries and customer requests in a timely manner and helps escalate project issues to management as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a Business or IT related discipline required or 1 to 3 years’ experience in providing IT consulting services. Preferred associate project management certification or equivalent industry experience.
Experience with project management and software development methodologies such as waterfall Agile / Scrum, hybrids, and SDLC methodologies a plus.
Process modeling and business process documentation experience a plus.
1 to 3 years’ experience managing the entire life cycle of a project for system implementations is highly desired.
Valid Hawaii Driver’s License and use of own vehicle required.
Proficient in PC navigation and Windows based software application skills.

Demonstrated knowledge of and skill in the following: leadership, effective communication, time management and scheduling, organizational awareness, project management, collaboration and team building
